detail_desc: Boxy-style blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, cap sleeves and visible seam down the front.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in sturdy, washed denim with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Fake flap pockets at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the shirt jacket is partly recycled.

Studio Collection. A pair of large, tear-shaped clip earrings in gold-coloured metal covered in glass rhinestones. Length approx. 7 cm. Width approx. 4.5 cm. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with three printed pairs. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with three printed pairs. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Skirts in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Covered elastication at the waist, gathers at the top and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Skirts in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Covered elastication at the waist, gathers at the top and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Short, straight-style dress in woven fabric with a high, frilled collar, yoke and covered buttons down the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with a short slit and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Smocked strappy top in a cotton weave with frill trims and wide, tie-top shoulder straps.
Smocked strappy top in a cotton weave with frill trims and wide, tie-top shoulder straps.
Calf-length jumpsuit in pleated, patterned jersey with a round elasticated neckline and short flutter sleeves. Elasticated waist with a decorative knot detail at the front and wide, straight legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Loafers in imitation leather with a decorative tab and moccasin seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and quilted insoles in satin made from recycled polyester. Fluted, rubber soles. Heel 2.2 cm.
Jacket in a sturdy, textured weave with a round neck and metal buttons down the front. Contrasting colour details and front pockets with a decorative button. Lined.
Rhinestone-decorated metal earrings. The zinc in the metal is recycled.
Rhinestone-decorated metal earrings. The zinc in the metal is recycled.

Studio Collection. Soft bra in patterned mesh with neat lace trims. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lined, triangular cups, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Studio Collection. Briefs in patterned mesh with neat lace trims. Low waist, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Studio Collection. Rectangular scarf in soft, patterned satin with a slight sheen. The polyester content of the scarf is partly recycled. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Studio Collection. Transparent body in stretch, patterned mesh with neat lace trims. Deep V-neck, long sleeves, a lined gusset with press-studs, and cutaway coverage at the back. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Fitted workout jumpsuit in fast-drying, functional stretch jersey with a V-neck, lined bust with removable inserts, and a deep V-neck at the back. Wide shoulder straps, a seam under the bust and at the waist and a reinforced gusset.
Long-sleeved body in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow ties at the back. Seam at the hips and lower section in jersey with press-studs at the crotch. Partly lined.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. V-neck and a wrapover, gently draped front with ties at one side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Lined.

Short dress in satin with notch lapels and long sleeves. Wrapover front with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front, a concealed, adjustable fastening at one side and wide ties at the other, which define the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, notch lapels, defined shoulders and long sleeves. Draped detail to define the waist, shaping seams at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck, notch lapels, defined shoulders and long sleeves. Draped detail to define the waist, shaping seams at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Dress in a softly draping viscose weave with decorative frills. Stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and wide, close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.

Dress in a softly draping viscose weave with decorative frills. Stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and wide, close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.

Dress in a softly draping viscose weave with decorative frills. Stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and wide, close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Short, fitted dress in draped jersey with a stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves.

Oversized shirt jacket in cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal welt front pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Studio Collection. Large, tear-shaped brooch in silver-coloured metal decorated with various-shaped glass rhinestones. Pin with a safety catch. Length approx. 10.5 cm. Width approx. 7 cm. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Short, wide dress in an airy weave with a collar and V-neck. Decorative gathers along the shoulder seams, a yoke at the back, long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined with a V-neck underdress that has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short, wide dress in an airy weave with a collar and V-neck. Decorative gathers along the shoulder seams, a yoke at the back, long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined with a V-neck underdress that has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Studio Collection. Leather boots with an overdimensioned shaft, square toes and covered block heels. Slimmer inner shaft for a more comfortable fit around the calves. Leather insoles and leather soles. Heel approx. 8 cm. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Calf-length satin dress with a concealed zip at the back, long, voluminous sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist with wide, sewn-on ties that fasten at the back to create a flattering silhouette. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the hips and above the hem. Unlined.
Short, pleated skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a sewn-in belt with a round, covered buckle at the front and an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in a jacquard weave containing some wool and shimmering metallic threads. Concealed zip on one side and a raw-edge flounce at the hem. Lined.

Long, wide hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, discreet side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.
Hairband in a patterned weave with covered elastication at the back. Can also be worn as a scarf around the neck.
Set with a narrow Alice band and an elasticated imitation leather scrunchie.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. Two pairs contain glittery threads. The polyester content of the gloves is recycled.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Round neckline and an opening with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Round neckline and an opening with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Suit trousers in twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs with creases.
Suit trousers in twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs with creases.
Suit trousers in twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs with creases.
Twill trousers with a high waist, pleats at the front and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Twill trousers with a high waist, pleats at the front and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.

Block-coloured sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Tailored trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a low waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a security button on the inside of the waistband. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and flared hems with a slit at the front. Part of the polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Tailored trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a low waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a security button on the inside of the waistband. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and flared hems with a slit at the front. Part of the polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Calf-length pleated skirt in soft imitation leather with a waistband and concealed zip in one side.
Calf-length pleated skirt in soft imitation leather with a waistband and concealed zip in one side.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Scarf in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Scarf in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top, a foldover polo neck and long sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif at the top, a foldover polo neck and long sleeves.
Calf-length skirt in a smocked weave that is fitted down to the middle of the thighs and finishes with a wide flounce. High waist with covered elastication. Unlined.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes along the sides.
Metal rings in various designs that come in a gift box with a transparent lid and a satin ribbon at the top.
Metal rings in various designs that come in a gift box with a transparent lid and a satin ribbon at the top.
Metal rings in various designs that come in a gift box with a transparent lid and a satin ribbon at the top.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long, double-layer sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long, double-layer sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Slightly longer, lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Diagonal front pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.

Jacket in a soft textured weave with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and a concealed drawstring to define the waist. Chest and front pockets with decorative, rhinestone-clad buttons, and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover detail at the front.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover detail at the front.
